definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The kinematical model of the hybrid-driven controllable press is set up.
sentences.chinese: 建立了混合驱动可控压力机的运动学分析模型。

sentences.english: The author has put forward a mathematical model of kinematics for tractor gearbox.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了变速箱运动学的数学模型。

sentences.english: This paper applies conformal geometric algebra to analyze the reverse kinematics of serial robot.
sentences.chinese: 本文应用共形几何代数分析串联机器人的运动学反解。

sentences.english: Analysis of the structure of the robot, in this based on the kinematics equations.
sentences.chinese: 分析了机器人的结构，在此基础上建立了运动学方程。

sentences.english: In chapter 1 we analyzed the kinematical characteristic of mobile robot.
sentences.chinese: 第1章详细分析了机器人的运动学特性。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the paper designs the kinematic state space representation of the Ice-skater Robot.
sentences.chinese: 同时，设计了溜冰机器人运动学状态空间表达式。

sentences.english: The attitude kinematics and dynamics are both described by error quaternions.
sentences.chinese: 姿态运动学和动力学用误差四元数描述。

sentences.english: This method is also suitable for locomotive horizontal drawbar kinetic analysis.
sentences.chinese: 该方法同样适用于机车水平牵引拉杆的运动学分析。

sentences.english: The firing mechanism of an underwater pistol was kinematically and dynamically analysed and calculated.
sentences.chinese: 对水下枪击发发射机构作运动学和动力学分析计算。

sentences.english: In this paper, the authors analyze the space mesh of error helical gear transmission by using kinematics.
sentences.chinese: 本文用运动学法进行了有误差斜齿轮的空间啮合分析。

sentences.english: An algorithm of general 2R(rotation) positioner inverse kinematics is presented.
sentences.chinese: 给出了一种通用的2R变位机的逆运动学算法。

sentences.english: It'll be statistical mechanics and then kinetics.
sentences.chinese: 接着就是统计力学和分子运动学。

sentences.english: The kinematical analysis in rolling process.
This is the process of untying the countrary sport.
sentences.chinese: 这就是逆运动学求解的过程。

sentences.english: The kinematics of helicopters in loop and roll maneuvers is analysed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文对筋斗和横滚机动飞行的运动学问题进行了分析。

sentences.english: On the basis of kinematic and dynamic analyses, it seems guite possible the formation of these geological struc…
sentences.chinese: 椐运动学及动力学分析，该区构造是重力滑动的产物。

pinyin: ren4 zhi1 shen2 jing1 xin1 li3 xue2
